criteria: Understanding of Risk Factors and Triggers
Use of Resources and Support Systems
descriptions: No goals are identified; no plan to remain drug-free is evident.
Identifies a goal, but it is vague and lacks a clear plan.
Identifies a short-term or long-term goal with a basic plan.
Identifies both short-term and long-term goals with a somewhat detailed plan, but some areas are underdeveloped.
Identifies both short-term and long-term goals with a detailed plan to remain drug-free. Most aspects of the plan are well-considered and realistic.

Identifies well-defined short-term and long-term goals with a comprehensive and highly detailed plan to remain drug-free. The plan is realistic, innovative, and considers potential challenges and solutions.
Demonstrates no understanding of risk factors or triggers associated with drug use.
Demonstrates minimal understanding of risk factors or triggers associated with drug use.
Identifies some risk factors or triggers but lacks a clear connection to personal goals.
Identifies relevant risk factors and triggers and attempts to incorporate strategies to avoid them, but may not be fully comprehensive.
Clearly identifies relevant risk factors and triggers and effectively integrates strategies to avoid them into the plan.
Demonstrates a deep understanding of risk factors and triggers and proactively develops innovative and highly effective strategies to avoid them, demonstrating resilience and adaptability.
No resources or support systems are identified or used.
Mentions resources or support systems but does not explain how they will be used.
Identifies resources or support systems that could be used, but lacks detail on how they will aid in achieving goals.
Describes how specific resources and support systems can be used to achieve goals, but may not fully address potential challenges.
Effectively integrates resources and support systems into the plan, clearly explaining how they will aid in achieving goals and addressing challenges.
Demonstrates a sophisticated approach to utilizing a diverse range of resources and support systems, showing a proactive and strategic approach to maintaining a drug-free lifestyle.
